page.title: 15COUNCIL DEPOT SKEGNESS
page.content: Skegness Council Depot is on Richmond Drive.The work they do is the general maintenance of council property in Skegness.The council see to keeping the roads tidy and free from litter,snow clearing in the winter and they also look after all the gardens and parks in Skegness.They have a very responsible job at the depot.The illuminations of Skegness are made at the depot.Norman the storeman works 40 hours every week.The busy times are in the morning mostly when people are coming in to get the materials to do their various jobs.His job is not affected by the change of season. He orders the building materials from {East Lindsey {District Council}central stores.The East Lindsey District Council is also responsible for the overall control of roadworks and maintenance.
